physical_appearance: This is a beige cheongsam that is paired with a matching jacket, also beige in colour. Floral patterns can be seen throughout the cheongsam and its jacket. A collar is present on the cheongsam as well. There are three pairs of buttons running vertically down the centre of the jacket. They are shaped like flowers. There are no visible tears on the cheongsam.
sgcool_label_text: The cheongsam and matching jacket has a burn-out floral pattern which is produced by using chemicals to dissolve parts of the velvet to create the pattern. The matching jacket has three intricately-designed flower buttons which match the floral motif of the fabric.
title_text: Beige velvet cheongsam with matching jacket
subject_terms_1: dresses (garments) womenswear floral patterns allover patterns
subject_terms_2: Qipao Ethnic costume Motifs Jackets Women's clothing
